edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.pedersenCommittedValue

Class SigmaPedersenCommittedValueProverInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.pedersenCommittedValue.SigmaPedersenCommittedValueProverInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SigmaProverInput, ZKProverInput

    public class SigmaPedersenCommittedValueProverInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements SigmaProverInput
    Concrete implementation of SigmaProtocol input, used by the SigmaPedersenCommittedValueProver.

    In SigmaPedersenCommittedValue protocol, the prover gets a GroupElement h, a commitment message,the committed value x and the value r in Zq such that c = g^r * h^x.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
